docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump seized on the shooting and protests in Charlotte, but it was unclear whether they could sway undecided voters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump seized on the shooting and protests in Charlotte, but it was unclear whether they could sway undecided voters.
docs.abstract: Demonstrations in Charlotte, NC, where violence has erupted in wake of fatal police shooting of black man Keith L Scott have given explosive new issue to presidential race in North Carolina; Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump are trying to sway voters in crucial swing state.

headline.main: Keith Scott’s Killing by Police Emerges as Issue in Tight North Carolina Race
headline.print_headline: Police Shooting Magnified in Swing State

docs.snippet: Ted Cruz announced Friday he will vote for Donald Trump, a dramatic about-face that may help unite a deeply divided Republican Party months after the fiery Texas conservative called Trump a "pathological liar" and "utterly amoral."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ted Cruz announced Friday he will vote for Donald Trump, a dramatic about-face that may help unite a deeply divided Republican Party months after the fiery Texas conservative called Trump a "pathological liar" and "utterly amoral."

headline.main: Cruz to Vote for Trump, Whom He Once Called 'Utterly Amoral'
